item.title: Debugging Python
item.description: Note: this is still a draft… Name errors (usually typos) from turtle import * from random import * def randomcolour(): red = randint(0, 255) green = randint(0, 255) blue = randint(0, 255) color(red, green, blue) def randomplace(): x = randint(-100, 100) y = randint(-100, 100) goto(x, y) shape("turtle") randomcolour() Indentation
